snippet: The men stole thousands of dollars’ worth of checks, credit cards and money orders from mailbags, according to the authorities.
abstract: Five baggage handlers responsible for loading mail onto international flights at Kennedy International Airport are arrested and accused of stealing at least $27,000 dollars in checks, credit cards and money orders from United States Postal Service mailbags.
lead_paragraph: The men stole thousands of dollars’ worth of checks, credit cards and money orders from mailbags, according to the authorities.

headline.main: 5 Baggage Handlers Are Accused of Stealing From Mail at Kennedy Airport
headline.print_headline: 5 Accused of Stealing From Mail at Kennedy
